name: entityLoad
syntax:
entityLoad(entityName [, filterCriteria] [, unique])
 entityLoad(entityName [, filterCriteria] [, sortOrder] [, options])
description: Loads and returns an array of entities of the specified entityname or an entity if unique=true or if a primary key id is passed in to filterCriteria.

params.name: filterCriteria
params.description: A struct of key value pairs, or a primary key value

params.name: unique
params.description: When true a single entity is returned, otherwise an array

params.name: sortOrder
params.description: Column name and direction list, eg: LastName ASC, FirstName ASC

params.name: options
params.description: A struct with possible keys: ignorecase, sortorder, offset, maxresults, cacheable, cachename, timeout

examples.title: Load by PK
examples.description: Loads an entity by primary key value

examples.title: Get multiple entities
examples.description: Returns an array of Employee instances with last name Smith
